Description: Fragment of oval, tapering handle from neck join to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine buff-beige. Rectangular stamp.
Production date: 152 BC (see N. Badoud, Le temps de Rhodes, 2015, 142.)
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (211)
